TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TcpTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ConnectionOrientedTransportBindingElement

summary.span: 表示 TCP 传输的绑定元素。

span.span: Represents the binding element for the TCP transport.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此传输使用 " `net.tcp` ：//：" 形式的 uri `hostname` `port` / `path` 。This transport uses URIs of the form "`net.tcp`://`hostname`:`port`/`path`". 其他 URI 组件是可选的。Other URI components are optional. 类是创建实现 TCP 传输协议的自定义绑定的起始点。The class is the starting point for creating a custom binding that implements the TCP transport protocol. 此传输针对 WCF 通信进行了优化。This transport is optimized for WCF communication. WCF 服务模型使用此类创建实现和接口的工厂对象 。The WCF service model uses this class to create factory objects that implement the and interfaces. 这些工厂对象反过来创建和接受使用 TCP 协议传输 SOAP 消息的通道。These factory objects, in turn, create and accept the channels that transmit SOAP messages using the TCP protocol. 您通过设置此类的属性配置此类创建的工厂，例如 和 。You configure the factories that this class creates by setting its properties, such as and . 您还可以设置基类 上的属性，例如：、 和 。You can also set properties on the base class , such as , , and . 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . 最后，可以设置基类 上的属性，例如 和 。Finally, you can set properties on the base class , such as and . 有关完整的属性列表，请参见 。For a complete list of properties, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此类。The following example shows how to use this class. [!code-csharp[S_UETcpTransportBindingElement#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uetcptransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#0)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是用于克隆绑定元素的复制构造函数，并且是公开的，因此派生类可以实现 。This method is a copy constructor used to clone the binding element, and is exposed so that derived classes can implement .

summary.span: 获取或设置可挂起的最大排队连接请求数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of queued connection requests that can be pending.

value.span: 返回可挂起的最大排队连接请求数。

span.span: Returns the maximum number of queued connection requests that can be pending.
The default is 10.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是套接字级别的属性，描述要排队的“挂起接受”请求数。 is a socket-level property that describes the number of "pending accept" requests to be queued. 应确保最大并发连接数不超过基础套接字队列。Ensure that the underlying socket queue is not exceeded by the maximum number of concurrent connections. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 ListenBacklog 值。The following example shows how to get the ListenBacklog value. [!code-csharp[S_UETcpTransportBindingElement#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uetcptransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#4)]

span.span: The value cannot be less than one.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否为此连接启用 TCP 端口共享。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether TCP port sharing is enabled for this connection.

value.span: 如果启用 TCP 端口共享，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if TCP port sharing is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此设置需要通过将 WCF TCP 端口共享服务的启动类型更改为 "手动" 或 "自动" 来启用它。Using this setting requires enabling the WCF TCP Port Sharing Service by changing its Startup Type to Manual or Automatic. 有关 TCP 侦听器及其启动方式的信息，请参阅 [Net.tcp 端口共享](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/net-tcp-port-sharing)。For information about the TCP Listener and how to start it, see [Net.TCP Port Sharing](/dotnet/framework/wcf/feature-details/net-tcp-port-sharing). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取一个指示是否启用 TCP 端口共享的值。The following example shows how to get a value that indicates whether TCP port sharing is enabled. [!code-csharp[S_UETcpTransportBindingElement#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uetcptransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#5)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个布尔值，该值指定是否启用 Teredo（一项用于对防火墙后的客户端进行寻址的技术）。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean that specifies whether Teredo (a technology for addressing clients that are behind firewalls) is enabled.

value.span: 如果启用了 Teredo，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if Teredo is enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性为基础 TCP 套接字启用 Teredo。This property enables Teredo for the underlying TCP socket. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Teredo 概述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96649)。For more information, see [Teredo Overview](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96649). 此属性仅适用于 [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)] 和 [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)]。This property is applicable only on [!INCLUDE[wxpsp2](~/includes/wxpsp2-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)]. [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 具有用于 Teredo 的计算机范围的配置选项，因此运行 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] 时将忽略此属性。has a machine-wide configuration option for Teredo, so when running [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)], this property is ignored. Teredo 要求客户端和服务计算机都安装 Microsoft IPv6 堆栈，并进行正确的配置以便使用 Teredo。Teredo requires that the client and service machines both have the Microsoft IPv6 stack installed and correctly configured for Teredo usage. 有关配置 Teredo 的详细信息，请参阅 [Teredo 概述](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96649)。For more information about configuring Teredo, see [Teredo Overview](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=96649). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何为基础 TCP 套接字启用 Teredo。The following example shows how to enable Teredo for the underlying TCP socket. [!code-csharp[S_UETcpTransportBindingElement#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uetcptransportbindingelement/cs/program.cs#7)]
